VLmGJ9eoV7Ipnjky41ujLw.text: This is our favorite Greek restaurant in Vegas. Always fresh and delicious. The owner is very customer friendly. The menu offers a wide variety of authentic Greek dishes. I had the mini souvlaki special....a steak skewer, a chicken skewer, rice, Greek salad, pita bread and tzatziki sauce. Out of this world! My husband had a lamb/beef gyro with Greek fries... also amazing. You can't go wrong here... give it a try!

photos.caption: Photo of Yassou Greek Grill Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mini Souvlaki Special with chicken

RuoLXR7SaGdfMLVnl0aFtg.text: Sooo good! Ordered ahead and it was ready by the time I arrived. The rice was perfectly cooked, chicken season awesome, the sauces on the side were a great addition to the food, as well as the pita bread. Also walked out with a free bottle of water to take with me to conquer these hot days in Vegas. Come for great Greek food and awesome service!

photos.caption: Photo of Yassou Greek Grill Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States

7aAzGndPtlwWQVLVJw1FCg.text: Great super fresh food. Great service. Expect to pay $10-15 per meal. The Greek salad was big and delicious. The mini chicken and pork souvlaki plate was more than enough for me. It came with fresh rice pilaf and a small salad.  Next time I'm getting the lemon chicken soup, and a side of spanakopita. We got a baklava to go. I'm sure it's good too.

JInMUR7Y4XyBLf5fkRWHHw.text: My husband and I were craving some good greek food and 2 of our friends recommended this place. Tonight was our first time.  I ordered a plate with chicken souvlaki and my husband had My big fat gyro. Food was fresh, delicious, my pita bread was nice and warm, my chicken was juicy and tender and portions were good too. We'll definitely be back. Glad they are close to our house.

wd0TkAGJ3rlIrou2CX_kyw.text: Live the vibe here. Service was great and i think he is the owner he is really friendly. Great interior ! Felt like i was traveling.
